Box 129188akkasah@nyu.edu / www.akkasah.orgThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2022-04-01T13:35:59
English .
Akkasah: Photography Archive (NYU Abu Dhabi)
'Egypt and Palestine' postcard album - Hisham Khatib Collection
Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
Unknown
AD.MC.030_ref164 40
94 Photographic Prints 94 postcards over 50 pages of an album
1910s-1920s Generally good, some brittle and warped. Electronic Records AD_MC_030_ref164
Content Description
Digital surrogates of 2,980 photographs and postcards (both individual prints and contained within albums) focused on the Near East, including the Holy Lands, Palestine, Jordan, Turkey, Syria and Egypt as well as a very small number from Europe. Many of the photographers or studios are identified, some are unknown.
Palestine Jordan Egypt Religious Sites Landscapes Archaeological Sites/Artifacts Postcards Khatib, Hisham, Mr.
The front cover of the album "Egypt and Palestine" with floral embossing.
